title: Suggestions for other games
body:
Hey all, just wondering if people can recommend other free PVP games out there I could try.

Lately I have been getting a gut fill of games filled with Bots, I only play ARAMs btw, and in all honesty they just drain any enjoyment I am getting from the games I play with real people.

With Riot unable or unwilling to do anything about it I have decided to vote with my feet and Wallet and head elsewhere, just need to find a new home.

replies.body: Fortnite, Smite, Paladins, Warframe, HoNE, etc
